articles.content:

articles.title: Not a distant war: U.S. residents with ties to Russia and Ukraine unite against Putin - USA TODAY
articles.description: Half of Ukrainian-Americans have relatives fighting in Ukraine, an exclusive USA TODAY/Suffolk Poll finds. So do one in five of the Russian-Americans.
